rawProps.name: items
rawProps.description: A collection of navigation items to be rendered inside the section

types.name: url
types.description: A location for the navigation item to navigate to when clicked

types.name: matches
types.description: A boolean property indicating whether the navigation item should respond to a closely matching location property

types.name: exactMatch
types.description: A boolean property indicating whether the navigation item should respond to an exactly matching location property

types.name: matchPaths
types.description: A string property providing a collection of additional paths for the navigation item to respond to

types.name: excludePaths
types.description: A string property providing an explicit collection of paths the navigation item should not respond to

types.name: icon
types.description: An icon to be displayed next to the navigation item

types.name: badge
types.description: A string property allowing content to be displayed in a badge next to the navigation item

types.name: label
types.description: A string property allowing content to be displayed as link text in the navigation item

types.name: disabled
types.description: A boolean property indicating whether the navigation item is disabled

types.name: new
types.description: Indicate whether the navigation item is new by adding an indicator dot to the parent and badge to the item (overwritten by the badge prop)

types.name: accessibilityLabel
types.description: A visually hidden label for screen readers to understand the content of a navigation item

types.name: selected
types.description: A boolean property indicating whether the navigation item is the currently-selected item

types.name: subNavigationItems
types.description: A collection of navigation items rendered as nested secondary navigation items

types.name: secondaryAction
types.description: Renders an icon-only action as a supplementary action next to a navigation item

types.name: onClick
types.description: A callback function to handle clicking on a navigation item

rawProps.name: icon
rawProps.description: An icon to be displayed next to the section title

rawProps.name: title
rawProps.description: A string property providing a title for the navigation section

rawProps.name: fill
rawProps.description: A boolean property indicating whether the section should take up all vertical space available

rawProps.name: rollup
rawProps.description: An object determining the collapsing behavior of the navigation section

types.name: after
types.description: A number of items after which the navigation section should be collapsed

types.name: view
types.description: A string property providing content for the section view action

types.name: hide
types.description: A string property providing content for the section hide action

types.name: activePath
types.description: A string property representing the current URL of your application

rawProps.name: action
rawProps.description: Renders an icon-only action as a supplementary action next to the section title

types.name: icon
types.description: An icon to be displayed as the content of the action

types.name: accessibilityLabel
types.description: A visually hidden label for screen readers to understand the content of the action

types.name: onClick
types.description: A callback function to handle clicking on the action

rawProps.name: separator
rawProps.description: A boolean property indicating whether the section should have a visual separator
